scripts.do-publish: yarn prepublish && yarn workspace react-query-swagger publish
scripts.prepublish: yarn update-nswag && yarn copy_from_v4_to_v3 && yarn copy_to_no_hooks && yarn generate-all && yarn typecheck
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace react-query-swagger tsc && yarn workspace pet-client-v3 tsc && yarn workspace pet-client tsc
scripts.generate-all: yarn generate-api-client-axios && yarn generate-api-client-axios-v3 && yarn generate-api-client-fetch && yarn generate-api-client-fetch-v3 && yarn generate-api-client-no-hooks && yarn generate-api-client-no-hooks-axios && yarn generate-api-client-no-hooks-no-modules && yarn generate-api-client-axios-vue && yarn typecheck
scripts.copy_from_v4_to_v3: yarn copyfiles -u 2 -e "src/templates/File.liquid" -e "src/templates/AxiosClient.liquid" -e "src/templates/FetchClient.liquid" src/templates/**/* src/templates_v3 && yarn replace "from '@tanstack/react-query';" "from 'react-query';" src/templates_v3/ReactQueryFile.liquid
